ygData.messageBody:
>From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>
>
>Hate to ask for a spoiler on where to get it, but I
>only found one person willing to sell one, but they
>backed out after agreeing to a price (grrrr). Anyway,
>could anyone let me know where you get it at?
>
>
>
>
>
SPOILER SPACE
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>

So you want a silvery axe..heh NICE choice! Go to permafrost. It can be
ripped from the Hands of Elite Guards in the Kings room. A party lvl 30 up
average should be ok there..but WARNING..DO NOT USE AREA EFFECT SPELLS
THERE. There are some ice giants near by who HATE bards...


Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 35 Chorus
Ambassador to the Ridgerunners
Innoruuk Server
